content: Hi and welcome to my portfolio ! My name is David and I enjoy coding in my free time. On the right-hand side of the page, you'll find a list of all the projects I've worked on. I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn, so I'm constantly adding new projects to my portfolio. If you're interested in learning more about me, you can download my resume using the link below. My resume includes details about my education, work experience, and other relevant information. If you have any questions or would like to get in touch, feel free to send me a message using the email on my portfolio. I look forward to hearing from you !
